name: AnimalBUZZ
0:
”Alexa, open animal buzz”
”start a quiz”
”what sound does a cat make”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal buzz
des: Animal Guess Game is a simple quiz game to help children associate animal name with their sound. After entering the quiz, users can guess the sound of an animal. There is also an information mode where users can ask the app what sound does a certain animal make. With this app, children can easily familiarize themselves with animal sound!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
